EmailTemplate.name: TS-2016-05-10-Philadelphia VMUG.EMAIL-Cocktail Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Philly VMUG Cocktail Hour
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, VMTurbo is sponsoring the upcoming Philly VMUG and will be hosting a happy hour <[[http://attend.com/phillyVMUG2016]]> post VMUG at the The Nosh, Radisson Hotel. Stop by our booth at the VMUG to pick up your ticket or show this email at the door for cocktails and appetizers, on us, from 6:00PM – 8:00PM on 5/10/16. We are also presenting in room Laurel East from 10:00 AM – 10:45 AM on best practices and how to manage complex, shared environments more intelligently. Attend our presentation for a chance to win a drone! Click here <[[http://attend.com/phillyVMUG2016]]> to save your spot today. <[[http://www.drakesf.com/]]>- The VMTurbo Team
